entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
